root.name: Toy Bizarre
root.description: OverviewToy Bizarre is a platformer that was developed by Activision and was released on the Commodore 64 and ZX Spectrum in 1984.GameplayYou take on the role of Merton, a maintenance worker in a toy store, and are tasked with protecting the store against toy robots that are running out of control. In order to achieve this you need to shut off the valves from which the toys are escaping.Your enemy in this game is known as Hefty Hilda, who tries to halt your progress against the robots by turning the valves back on again.
